options.defaultValue: Pay simply with your credit card. We accept MasterCard, Visa or American Express.
Accept SEPA Direct Debit Payments with Stripe.
Pay your order with credit card. We accept Visa, Mastercard and American Express.
Pay your purchases starting from 99 with Santander Installments. With an annual percentage rate of max. 9,9% (6 - 72 monthly rates).
Make purchases worth 2000 DKK and up with Santander Installments. Maximum annual percentage rate of 9.9% (6 - 72 monthly payments).
Vi gir deg mulighet til å  enten utsette betalingen eller å  dele opp betalingen med faste beløp hver må ned i samarbeid med Santander Consumer Bank.
Make purchases worth 540 SEK and up with Santander Installments. Maximum annual percentage rate of 9.9% (6 - 72 monthly payments).

Simply pay while you are shopping online. By entering your familiar online banking login details and confirmation codes with a maximum level of security. The online shop will receive a real-time transaction confirmation immediately after the transfer has been listed.

Upon redirect you'll log in with your online banking crendentials and confirm the bank transfer to the merchant. He'll receive a confirmation immediately and can ship your order right away. Direct bank transfer is a service by Santander, but can be used by customers of any bank.
Voldoe in betaalbare maandelijkse termijnen via onze partner Zinia
Mit dem Zinia Rechnungskauf geben Sie Ihren Kunden 14 Tage Zeit um den Einkauf zu bezahlen.
Simply let your customers pay by credit card. We accept MasterCard, Visa, American Express and many more.
Simply let your customers pay after delivery. You receive your payout before the customer pays the invoice.
